Definition: [ἐρεύγομαι] of uncertain affinity; to belch, i.e. (figuratively) to speak out
[ἐρευνάω] apparently from {{g2046}} (through the idea of inquiry); to seek, i.e. (figuratively) to investigate
[ἐρέω] probably a fuller form of {{g4483}}; an alternate for {{g2036}} in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. speak or say
[ἐρημία] from {{g2048}}; solitude (concretely)
[ἐργάτης] from {{g2041}}; a toiler; figuratively, a teacher
[ἔργον] from a primary (but obsolete) ἔργω (to work); toil (as an effort or occupation); by implication, an act
[ἐρεθίζω] from a presumed prolonged form of {{g2054}}; to stimulate (especially to anger)
[ἐρείδω] of obscure affinity; to prop, i.e. (reflexively) get fast
[ἔρημος] of uncertain affinity; lonesome, i.e. (by implication) waste (usually as a noun, {{g5561}} being implied)
[ἐρημόω] from {{g2048}}; to lay waste (literally or figuratively)
[ἔπος] from {{g2036}}; a word
[ἐπόπτης] from {{g1909}} and a presumed derivative of {{g3700}}; a looker-on
[ἑπτά] a primary number; seven
[ἐπουράνιος] from {{g1909}} and {{g3772}}; above the sky
[ἑπτακισχίλιοι] from {{g2034}} and {{g5507}}; seven times a thousand
[ἑπτάκις] adverb from {{g2033}}; seven times
[Ἔραστος] from ἐράω (to love); beloved; Erastus, a Christian
[ἔπω] a primary verb (used only in the definite past tense, the others being borrowed from {{g2046}}, {{g4483}}, and {{g5346}}); to speak or say (by word or writing) Compare {{g3004}}.
[ἐργασία] from {{g2040}}; occupation; by implication, profit, pains
[ἐργάζομαι] middle voice from {{g2041}}; to toil (as a task, occupation, etc.), (by implication) effect, be engaged in or with, etc.
[ἐπιχέω] from {{g1909}} and χέω (to pour);
[ἐπιχορηγέω] from {{g1909}} and {{g5524}}; to furnish besides, i.e. fully supply, (figuratively) aid or contribute
[ἐπιφώσκω] a form of {{g2017}}; to begin to grow light
[ἐπιχειρέω] from {{g1909}} and {{g5495}}; to put the hand upon, i.e. undertake
[ἐποικοδομέω] from {{g1909}} and {{g3618}}; to build upon, i.e. (figuratively) to rear up
[ἐποκέλλω] from {{g1909}} and ὀκέλλω (to urge); to drive upon the shore, i.e. to beach a vessel
[ἐπιχορηγία] from {{g2023}}; contribution
[ἐπιχρίω] from {{g1909}} and {{g5548}}; to smear over
[ἐπονομάζω] from {{g1909}} and {{g3687}}; to name further, i.e. denominate
[ἐποπτεύω] from {{g1909}} and a derivative of {{g3700}}; to inspect, i.e. watch
[ἐπιφωνέω] from {{g1909}} and {{g5455}}; to call at something, i.e. exclaim
[ἐπιφέρω] from {{g1909}} and {{g5342}}; to bear upon (or further), i.e. adduce (personally or judicially (accuse, inflict)), superinduce
[ἐπιφαύω] a form of {{g2014}}; to illuminate (figuratively)
[ἐπιφανής] from {{g2014}}; conspicuous, i.e. (figuratively) memorable
[ἐπιφάνεια] from {{g2016}}; a manifestation, i.e. (specially) the advent of Christ (past or future)
[ἐπιφαίνω] from {{g1909}} and {{g5316}}; to shine upon, i.e. become (literally) visible or (figuratively) known
[ἐπιτυγχάνω] from {{g1909}} and {{g5177}}; to chance upon, i.e. (by implication) to attain
[ἐπίτροπος] from {{g1909}} and {{g5158}} (in the sense of {{g2011}}); a commissioner, i.e. domestic manager, guardian
[ἐπιτροπή] from {{g2010}}; permission, i.e. (by implication) full power
[ἐπιτρέπω] from {{g1909}} and the base of {{g5157}}; to turn over (transfer), i.e. allow
[εὐαγγελίζω] from {{g2095}} and {{g32}}; to announce good news ("evangelize") especially the gospel
[Εὖα] of Hebrew origin ({{h2332}}); Eua (or Eva, i.e. Chavvah), the first woman
[εὖ] neuter of a primary εὖς (good); (adverbially) well
[ἔτος] apparently a primary word; a year
[ἑτοίμως] adverb from {{g2092}}; in readiness
[ἕτοιμος] from an old noun ἐτεός (fitness); adjusted, i.e. ready
[ἑτοιμασία] from {{g2090}}; preparation
[ἑτοιμάζω] from {{g2092}}; to prepare Compare {{g2680}}.
[εὐαγγελιστής] from {{g2097}}; a preacher of the gospel
[εὐαγγέλιον] from the same as {{g2097}}; a good message, i.e. the gospel
[ἐπιτιμάω] from {{g1909}} and {{g5091}}; to tax upon, i.e. censure or admonish; by implication, forbid
[ἐπιτιμία] from a compound of {{g1909}} and {{g5092}}; properly, esteem, i.e. citizenship; used (in the sense of {{g2008}}) of a penalty
[ἐπισχύω] from {{g1909}} and {{g2480}}; to avail further, i.e. (figuratively) insist stoutly
[ἐπισωρεύω] from {{g1909}} and {{g4987}}; to accumulate further, i.e. (figuratively) seek additionally
[ἐπιταγή] from {{g2004}}; an injunction or decree; by implication, authoritativeness
[ἐπιτάσσω] from {{g1909}} and {{g5021}}; to arrange upon, i.e. order
[ἐπιτελέω] from {{g1909}} and {{g5055}}; to fulfill further (or completely), i.e. execute; by implication, to terminate, undergo
[ἐπιτήδειος] from ἐπιτηδές (enough); serviceable, i.e. (by implication) requisite
[ἐπιτίθημι] from {{g1909}} and {{g5087}}; to impose (in a friendly or hostile sense)
[ἔσω] from {{g1519}}; inside (as preposition or adjective)
[ἔσωθεν] from {{g2080}}; from inside; also used as equivalent to {{g2080}} (inside)
[ἐσώτερος] comparative of {{g2080}}; interior
[ἑταῖρος] from ἔτης (a clansman); a comrade
[ἑτερόγλωσσος] from {{g2087}} and {{g1100}}; other- tongued, i.e. a foreigner
[ἑτεροδιδασκαλέω] from {{g2087}} and {{g1320}}; to instruct differently
[ἑτεροζυγέω] from a compound of {{g2087}} and {{g2218}}; to yoke up differently, i.e. (figuratively) to associate discordantly
[ἕτερος] of uncertain affinity; (an-, the) other or different
[ἑτέρως] adverb from {{g2087}}; differently
[ἔτι] perhaps akin to {{g2094}}; "yet," still (of time or degree)
[ἐσχάτως] adverb from {{g2078}}; finally, i.e. (with {{g2192}}) at the extremity of life
[ἔσχατος] a superlative probably from {{g2192}} (in the sense of contiguity); farthest, final (of place or time)
[ἐστέ] second person plural present indicative of {{g1510}}; ye are
[Ἐσρώμ] of Hebrew origin ({{h2696}}); Esrom (i.e. Chetsron), an Israelite
[ἔστω] second person singular present imperative of {{g1510}}; be thou;  also  ἔστωσαν, third person of the same; let them be
[ἐστί] third person singular present indicative of {{g1510}}; he (she or it) is; also (with neuter plural) they are
[ἔσομαι] future of {{g1510}}; will be
[ἐσμέν] first person plural indicative of {{g1510}}; we are
[ἑσπέρα] feminine of an adjective hesperos (evening); the eve ({{g5610}} being implied)
[ἔσοπτρον] from {{g1519}} and a presumed derivative of {{g3700}}; a mirror (for looking into) Compare {{g2734}}.
[εὐαρεστέω] from {{g2101}}; to gratify entirely
[ἐσθίω] strengthened for a primary ἔδω (to eat); used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by {{g5315}}; to eat (usually literal)
[Ἐσλί] of Hebrew origin (probably for {{h454}}); Esli, an Israelite
[ἐσθής] from ἕννυμι (to clothe); dress
[ἔσθησις] from a derivative of {{g2066}}; clothing (concretely)

[ἔρχομαι] middle voice of a primary verb  (used only in the present and imperfect tenses, the others being  supplied by a kindred (middle voice)             ἐλεύθομαι,    or (active)      ἔλθω,        which do not otherwise occur); to come or go (in a great variety of applications, literally and  figuratively)
[ἐρωτάω] apparently from {{g2046}} (compare {{g2045}}); to interrogate; by implication, to request Compare {{g4441}}.
[ἑρπετόν] neuter of a derivative of ἕρπω (to creep); a reptile, i.e. (by Hebraism (compare {{h7431}})) a small animal
[ἐρυθρός] of uncertain affinity; red, i.e. (with {{g2281}}) the Red Sea
[Ἑρμῆς] perhaps from {{g2046}}; Hermes, the name of the messenger of the Greek deities; also of a Christian
[Ἑρμογένης] from {{g2060}} and {{g1096}}; born of Hermes; Hermogenes, an apostate Christian
[ἑρμηνεύω] from a presumed derivative of {{g2060}} (as the god of language); to translate
[ἑρμηνεία] from the same as {{g2059}}; translation
[ἔριον] of obscure affinity; wool
[ἐριθεία] perhaps as the same as {{g2042}}; properly, intrigue, i.e. (by implication) faction
[ἐρίζω] from {{g2054}}; to wrangle
[ἐρήμωσις] from {{g2049}}; despoliation
[Ἑρμᾶς] probably from {{g2060}}; Hermas, a Christian
[ἔριφος] perhaps from the same as {{g2053}} (through the idea of hairiness); a kid or (genitive case) goat
[ἐρίφιον] from {{g2056}}; a kidling, i.e. (genitive case) goat (symbolically, wicked person)
[ἔρις] of uncertain affinity; a quarrel, i.e. (by implication) wrangling
